Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add level editor and Synty Meadow biome assets

- Add complete level editor with asset browser, placement, and scene management
- Add 197 Synty Polygon Biomes Meadow assets:
  - 8 buildings (GLB)
  - 96 props (FBX) 
  - 15 trees/bushes (3 GLB + 12 FBX)
  - 22 rocks (FBX)
  - 29 grass (8 GLB + 21 FBX)
  - 15 flowers (FBX)
  - 12 environment (FBX)
- Add meadow texture atlas and support textures
- Add main menu UI component
- Add copy-unreal-glbs utility script
- Remove old character assets (will re-add later)
